name: Moonvalley
headline: Building the next generation AI creative studio
description: We are building the next generation creative studio, powered by the most capable video and image foundational models. We are creating the place where generative image and video experiences will be built. Backed by Y-Combinator and Khosla Ventures.

founders.name: Naeem T, Founder
founders.description: Founder @ Moonvalley. Prev: Product growth lead @ Zapier, ML Researcher @ UWaterloo

founders.name: John Thomas, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder & COO @ ContentFly | Ex Management Consultant @ IBM; Jackman

# Moonvalley is a research company building the future of generative media.
## About Moonvalley
About Moonvalley
We are a well funded team of world class deep learning researchers, engineers & artists building the future of generative media.

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Moonvalley**

**Mission**: Moonvalley is on a mission to build the next generation of AI-powered creative studios. With a focus on generative media, they intend to redefine how video and image experiences are created and enjoyed.

**Background**: Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W21, Moonvalley has quickly established itself in the tech landscape. The company is based in Toronto, Canada, and boasts a talented team of 16 employees comprised of leading experts in deep learning and media.

**Founders & Team**: The founding team is an impressive blend of talent hailing from recognizable names like DeepMind, IBM, Google, and Meta. The leaders include veterans like Naeem from Zapier and several ex-DeepMind researchers, which sets a solid foundation for innovation. They truly know their craft.

**Funding**: Backed by prominent investors such as Y Combinator and Khosla Ventures, Moonvalley is well-equipped to pursue its ambitious goals in the realm of generative AI.

**What They Do**: Essentially, Moonvalley is crafting state-of-the-art generative AI tools designed to empower artists worldwide. They're creating a platform where creativity meets cutting-edge technology, enabling artists to step into the director's chair and unleash their visions like never before.

**Culture and Opportunities**: With a forward-thinking culture, Moonvalley is not only focused on product development but is actively hiring doers and innovators who aspire to push boundaries. They’re cultivating an environment where creativity and technology intersect, welcoming those eager to be part of this cutting-edge journey. 

**Connect with Moonvalley**: They’ve established a strong online presence and continue to engage with the creative community. You can learn more and explore opportunities on their website: [moonvalley.ai](https://moonvalley.ai).

In summary, Moonvalley isn't just another startup; it’s a pulsating hub of innovation in generative AI aimed at shaping the future of creative media. If you're in the creative domain or tech landscape, keeping an eye on Moonvalley might just be worthwhile.
